definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Popularization of compulsory pre-school education should be given priority.
sentences.chinese: 義務教育應優先提高學前教育。

sentences.english: Round development of the pre-school education.
Thus, to enable the emergence of modern pre-school education, with the objective needs.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，就使近代學前教育的產生，有了客觀的需要。

sentences.english: You called it a script kiddy language, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你還把它叫做一種學前教育編程語言，還記得吧？

sentences.english: We will also attach importance to pre-school education and care about special education.
sentences.chinese: 重視學前教育，關心特殊教育。

sentences.english: Among a subsample of children living below a poverty threshold, no racial differences in preschool impact are detected.
sentences.chinese: 對在貧困線以下的孩子，學前教育的影響無種族差異。

sentences.english: Until the early 20th century, it came with a pre-school institutions.
sentences.chinese: 直到20世紀初期，纔出現了學前教育機構。

sentences.english: A privately-run school that carries out pre-school education shall charge fee by the month.
sentences.chinese: 實施學前教育的民辦學校，以月爲單位收取費用。

sentences.english: We will speed up the development of preschool education.
Vouchers will help a large number of our young children get a better pre-school education.
sentences.chinese: 學券制將爲我們大部分的學童帶來更優質的學前教育。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen Heqin is the founder of Chinese preschool education.
sentences.chinese: 陳鶴琴先生是中國現代學前教育的奠基者。

sentences.english: We will improve preschool education and develop special education schools.
sentences.chinese: 加強學前教育和特殊教育學校建設。

sentences.english: Lu said the city government will actively promote preschool education reform in the future.
sentences.chinese: 盧志華說，市政府將加快推進市區學前教育改革發展。

sentences.english: So our ministry of education are discussing if the preschool education is compulsory schooling with 13 years?
sentences.chinese: 教育部正在研究“學前教育”納入13年義務教育。

sentences.english: Missed this critical period of pre-school education are often less effective.
sentences.chinese: 錯過了學前教育這一關鍵期則往往事倍功半。

sentences.english: So it would make things worse if they miss such education.
sentences.chinese: 錯過了學前教育這一關鍵期則往往事倍功半。

definition: practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
student of a senior high school
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
